## Support

Thank you for using git-ops! If you need help, here are the best ways to get support:

### ğŸ“š Documentation

- [README](../README.md) - Project overview and quick start
- [Contributing Guide](../CONTRIBUTING.md) - How to contribute
- [Wiki](https://github.com/InfinityXOneSystems/git-ops/wiki) - Detailed documentation

### ğŸ’¬ Community Support

- **GitHub Discussions**: [Start a discussion](https://github.com/InfinityXOneSystems/git-ops/discussions) for questions, ideas, and general conversation
- **Issues**: [Open an issue](https://github.com/InfinityXOneSystems/git-ops/issues/new/choose) for bug reports and feature requests

### ğŸ› Bug Reports

If you've found a bug, please:
1. Search [existing issues](https://github.com/InfinityXOneSystems/git-ops/issues) to avoid duplicates
2. Use our [bug report template](ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug_report.md)
3. Include as much detail as possible

### ğŸ’¡ Feature Requests

Have an idea? We'd love to hear it!
1. Check [existing feature requests](https://github.com/InfinityXOneSystems/git-ops/issues?q=is%3Aissue+label%3Aenhancement)
2. Use our [feature request template](ISSUE_TEMPLATE/feature_request.md)
3. Explain your use case and how it would benefit others

### ğŸ”’ Security Issues

For security vulnerabilities, please:
- Review our [Security Policy](../SECURITY.md)
- Report via [GitHub Security Advisories](https://github.com/InfinityXOneSystems/git-ops/security/advisories/new)
- **Do not** open public issues for security vulnerabilities

### ğŸ“§ Direct Contact

For urgent matters or private inquiries:
- Email: [contact information]
- Twitter: [@InfinityXOne] (if applicable)

### â° Response Times

We aim to respond to:
- Security issues: Within 48 hours
- Bug reports: Within 7 days
- Feature requests: Within 14 days
- General questions: When time permits

### ğŸ¤ Contributing

Want to help? Check out our [Contributing Guide](../CONTRIBUTING.md)!
